TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ivalino, title = Ivalino, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ivalino} }

S.FORM: Ivalino Itiniay i Lanyu Cen no Taitung ko Ivalino a niyaro', 299 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 891 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 831 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 60 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Yami 89%, Amis 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 1%.

Ivalino Itiniay i Lanyo Cen no Taitong ko Ivalino a niyaro', 299 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 891 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 93% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 831 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 7% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 60 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Yami 89%, Amis 2%, Paiwan 1%, roma 1%.
